# Testing your Markdown installation

Compile this document to test whether you have installed Markdown and 
LaTeX correctly.
If no PDF file gets created after clicking on `Knit/Knit to PDF`, please
make a screenshot from the error message and post it into the Moodle forum.
If the file `test.log` was created during the compillation attemt, please also
post this file alongside the screenshot.
